Description:
ARRAY IT'S HERE
Be swept away by everything Melbourne with amazing views of Port Philip Bay, the CBD, Yarra River, and Docklands.
Overlooking the marina on Yarra's Edge, sits this sumptuous 131 square metre apartment in Mirvac's sought after Array.
Featuring floor to ceiling windows presenting fantastic panoramic views, this apartment has space, style, and quality.
Offering an open plan living, dining and kitchen, this contemporary home is built for entertainment with the living room opening up to a generous balcony drinking in sensational views.
Just imagine soaking in that vista with a cold drink and some cool tunes at the end of a long day.
The kitchen is a chef's dream with an island bench, abundant cupboard space, stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, and concealed dishwasher.
Both bedrooms offer brilliant views, with the master complemented by a walk-in-robe and a stylish ensuite, complete with bath.
The central bathroom continues the clean, modern theme of the apartment.
A roomy study / single bedroom and separate laundry round out this beautifully appointed home.
Central heating & cooling, 2 secure car spaces, and secure swipe & video intercom entry complete this sophisticated residence.
With access to an indoor heated lap pool, spa, sauna, steam room and gymnasium at Mirvac's Rekdek, as well as an onsite gym and residents lounge, this is executive, low maintenance living at its most exceptional.
With public transport, world class shopping at South Wharf, and an array of waterside restaurants, bars and cafes on your doorstep, this must see apartment is perfectly situated only minutes from the CBD and City Link.
Other features include
Built in Fisher and Paykel Fridge/ freezer
Built in wine fridge
Built in Miele dishwasher, oven and microwave
Large storage cage behind car parks
Two built in study desks
Italian crystal lights over kitchen island bench
Paris finish in kitchen
Double transparent / block out blinds throughout the apartment
Sliding balcony screen door fitted
Double glazed windows throughout the apartment
